name: A sudden increase in secret reads count

fields.name: content
fields.value:
1. Review recent changes: Check if there have been any recent changes to the vault or its policies that could explain this increase.
 2. Investigate access patterns: Analyze who has accessed the secrets and how frequently they have done so. This can help identify any unusual or suspicious activity.
 3. Validate access permissions: Ensure that users have the appropriate access levels and permissions for the secrets they are accessing.
 4. Monitor for unusual behavior: Keep an eye out for any other signs of unusual activity, such as failed login attempts or unexpected network traffic.
 5. Contact support: If you cannot resolve the issue yourself, contact the support team for assistance. They will be able to investigate further and provide guidance on how to address the problem.
